content: What is the highest rated book on Goodreads that was published after 2000?

As an AI language model, I don't have real-time data access, so I can't provide you with the current highest-rated book on Goodreads published after 2000. However, you can easily find this information by visiting the Goodreads website or app. They usually have a list of the highest-rated books, and you can filter by publication date to find those published after 2000.
